ygData.subject: Re: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: Since I asked about dual weild just a few days ago, I have received wonderful amounts of useful information and advice from you all. Thank you all very much
ygData.messageBody:
Since I asked about dual weild just a few days ago, I have received
wonderful amounts of useful information and advice from you all. Thank you
all very much for teaching me the ways of weaving and chain/fear'ing and
other assorted fight and merchanting techniques.

It's strange though for me how it came up. I was in Lava or Najena at the
time with a full group. I was in no particular hurry to get back to the
guild to train or anything, but when I attempted to equip two melee weapons,
I could not. I was like ok, I do indeed have to go train on it - no big
deal. Upon arriving to that guy outside the bard guild in Freeport, I
scrolled down to my skill to start the basics of. Amazingly enough, I saw
that they would charge me 1pp and something to train. WOW no thanks I'll
talk to you later!! LOL When I went back to fight I was able to weild both
hands with a weapon. So no harm done, only a little confusion. =)
I just thought I'd mention it.

Pava, Bard of the Dual Wield Measure
Silent Dragons
Cazic Thule
